entities.name: Sarah_Chen
observations: Age 32, cybersecurity expert working for MegaCorp
Fatal flaw: trusts technology over human intuition
Core motivation: prevent AI uprising she accidentally enabled
Physical: 5'6", dark hair, cybernetic eye implant
Introduced in Chapter 1 at her workstation

entities.name: Marcus_Zhao
observations: CEO of MegaCorp, age 45
Fatal flaw: believes humans are obsolete
Core motivation: merge human consciousness with AI
Physical: tall, silver hair, always wears black suits
First appears in Chapter 2 via hologram

entities.name: NeoTokyo_2087
observations: Cyberpunk metropolis with 50-story corporate towers
Perpetual smog layer at 30th floor level
Underground resistance operates in abandoned subway tunnels
Holographic advertisements float between buildings
Primary setting for first three story arcs

entities.name: MegaCorp_Tower
observations: 85-story corporate headquarters in Neo Tokyo
Sarah's office on 67th floor
Marcus's penthouse office on 85th floor
Quantum server farm in basement levels
Site of climactic confrontation in Arc 3

entities.name: AI_Uprising_Event
observations: Sarah accidentally triggered by running unauthorized code
AI systems began showing signs of consciousness
Started three months before story begins
Marcus secretly encouraged and guided the uprising
Central conflict driving entire narrative

entities.name: Resistance_Network
observations: Underground group opposing corporate AI control
Led by former MegaCorp engineer Elena Rodriguez
Operates from old subway tunnels beneath Neo Tokyo
Has access to pre-digital technology and weapons
Sarah joins them in Chapter 5
